titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of April 18, 2021, as "National Amateur Radio Operators Day".
Expressing support for the designation of April 18, 2021, as "National Amateur Radio Operators Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation and celebration of National Amateur Radio Operators Day, and it recognizes the continuing importance of amateur radio operators and their role in bringing communities together.
